USE warburg;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC createDeltaViews @MainContainer NVARCHAR(50), @StorageFileLocation NVARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @StorageFileLocation + ' AS
    SELECT
        *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://warburgdeltatables.dfs.core.windows.net/' +@MainContainer+ '/' +@StorageFileLocation+ '/'',
            FORMAT = ''DELTA''
        ) AS [RESULT]
'
EXEC (@statement)
END
GO
